testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Real entrepreneurs already selling with Shopifree

1.quote: I used to spend hours putting together price lists to send on WhatsApp. Now I just share my link and orders come in on their own. In the first week I already had 15 orders.
1.name: Carolina M.

2.quote: The best part is I could start for free and when I saw it was working, I upgraded to Pro to accept card payments. My sales went up 40% because customers didn't have to do bank transfers anymore.
2.name: Miguel R.

3.quote: I know nothing about technology and in 5 minutes I already had my catalog online. My clients share it with each other and I get orders from people I don't even know. It's incredible.
3.name: Valentina S.

cta.title: Ready to start selling?
cta.subtitle: Create your catalog in less than 3 minutes. It's free.
